title: Sierra Space raises $290 million
summary: Sierra Space has raised $290 million in a round led by Japanese investors, providing the company with additional funding to accelerate work on its Dream Chaser vehicle and commercial space stations.

title: Charity Weeden is NASA’s New Policy Chief

title: Boeing’s Quantum Leap: Satellites in Record Time, Boosting National Security and Commercial Connectivity

title: Blue Origin CEO Smith to step down
summary: Bob Smith, chief executive of Blue Origin, will resign from the company in December and be replaced by Dave Limp, the Amazon executive who had been overseeing development of its Project Kuiper constellation.
